title: How much money does Brunswick County provide, per student, to (1) those educated by Brunswick County Board of Education and (2) those educated outside of the Brunswick County School system, i.e. home schooled, charter schooled, private schooled?  Also, what is the total dollars provided for education and what percent of the county tax revenue is that?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/04/brunswick-schools/
